title: French Language Essentials - Easy Mode
description: Choose the English equivalent of the given French language.

items.question: Pouvez-vous me recommander un bon restaurant ?
choices: Can you recommend a good restaurant?
Do you know a good restaurant?
items.answer: Can you recommend a good restaurant?

items.question: Quelle est la spécialité de la maison ?
Je voudrais annuler ma réservation
choices: I would like to cancel my reservation
I would like to change my reservation
I would like to confirm my reservation
I'm running late for my reservation
items.answer: I would like to cancel my reservation

items.question: Pourriez-vous m'expliquer ce terme ?
choices: Could you explain this term to me?
Can you use this in a sentence?
items.answer: Could you explain this term to me?

items.question: Je cherche un cours de français avancé
choices: I'm looking for an advanced French course
I'm looking for a beginner French course
items.answer: I'm looking for an advanced French course

items.question: Je travaille sur mon accent
choices: I want to change my accent

items.question: Pouvez-vous parler plus naturellement, s'il vous plaît ?
choices: Can you speak more naturally, please?
Can you speak more slowly, please?
Can you write it down, please?
items.answer: Can you speak more naturally, please?
